title: Request for access - new employee
description: Hello team, We have a new employee joining our Creative department next Monday. They need access to Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, and our internal design repository. Please set up their accounts and provide temporary credentials.

title: Print job issue - Marketing materials won't print
description: Our marketing team is trying to print flyers for tomorrow's conference but the color printer keeps jamming. We've tried clearing the paper path but the issue persists.

title: SSO not working after new security audit
description: Our entire team is locked out of our SaaS applications after the security team implemented new authentication policies. This is affecting Salesforce, Slack, and our project management tools. Business operations are severely impacted.

title: I need help with my laptop
description: Hi team! For some reason I can't restart my laptop. The screen just goes black and nothing happens when I press the power button. I have an important presentation tomorrow morning.

title: Network connectivity issues in Conference Room B
description: The WiFi in Conference Room B keeps dropping during video calls. This has happened three times this week during important client meetings. Can someone please investigate?

title: Email server down - cannot send/receive emails
description: Our email server appears to be down. No one in the office can send or receive emails. This started about 30 minutes ago and is affecting all departments.

title: Software license renewal - Adobe Creative Cloud
description: Our Adobe Creative Cloud licenses expire next week. We need to renew them for 15 users in the design team. Please coordinate with procurement.

title: VPN connection keeps timing out
description: I'm working from home and my VPN connection keeps dropping every 10-15 minutes. I've tried restarting my router and computer but the issue continues. This is preventing me from accessing company resources.

title: Monitor display issues - flickering screen
description: My external monitor has been flickering for the past few days. Sometimes it goes completely black for a few seconds. I've checked the cables but they seem fine.

title: Password reset request - urgent
description: I forgot my password and the reset link isn't working. I have a client demo in 2 hours and need access to our CRM system immediately. Please help!

title: Antivirus software blocking legitimate application
description: Our new accounting software is being blocked by McAfee antivirus. The finance team cannot complete month-end closing without access to this application. Can you whitelist it?

title: Backup system failure notification
description: Received automated alert that last night's backup failed. This is the third failure this month. Please investigate and ensure our data is protected.

title: Phone system not routing calls correctly
description: Calls to our main number are not being transferred to the correct departments. Customers are complaining about being transferred multiple times.

title: Shared drive permissions issue
description: I can't access the Marketing shared drive even though I was added to the team last week. Getting 'Access Denied' error when trying to open folders.

title: Database connection timeout errors
description: Our inventory management system is throwing database timeout errors during peak hours. This is slowing down order processing significantly.

title: Keyboard keys sticking - replacement needed
description: Several keys on my keyboard are sticking, particularly the spacebar and enter key. This is affecting my productivity. Can I get a replacement?

title: Mobile device management setup
description: New sales team members need their company phones configured with email, calendar, and access to our CRM mobile app. There are 5 devices that need setup.

title: Website loading very slowly
description: Our company website is taking 15-20 seconds to load pages. This is affecting customer experience and potentially losing us business. Please investigate server performance.

title: Security certificate expired - internal tools
description: Getting SSL certificate warnings when accessing our internal project management tool. The certificate appears to have expired yesterday.

title: Request for software installation - development tools
description: New developer needs Visual Studio Code, Git, Node.js, and Docker installed on their workstation. They start next Monday and need everything ready.
